backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that stores and exposes project and social link data via query functions, mixing in blob storage functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three landing page requirements (reverting label to 'PHASMA Robotics', adding description text, and linking to phasma-cek.caffeine.xyz) to their implementing file.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing the purpose and key details of each frontend source file for reference during build planning.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that wraps the app in a React Query provider and renders the PhasmaLanding page with toast notifications in permanent dark mode.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Empty file with no content; the theme toggle component has no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches a backend actor for either anonymous or authenticated users, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines two React Query hooks, useGetProjects and useGetSocialLinks, that fetch data from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS defining a purple-themed OKLCH dark-mode color system via CSS variables and a custom ghost-glow utility class.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React tree with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/PhasmaLanding.tsx: Linktree-style landing page displaying the PHASMA logo, 'PHASMA Robotics' heading with tagline, two project cards, and social links with fallback static data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with OKLCH-based color tokens, custom border radii, accordion animations, and typography/container-queries/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state and feature history for a website with a 'PHASMA Robotics' navigation section, recording completed and pending features related to label naming, description text, and URL linking.
unknown.txt: A partial template snippet describing the format for specifying required images in a project spec document.
